Cookie.consent: We use cookies to store essential session information and enhance your experience on our site. By continuing to browse this site, you agree to our use of cookies.

Policies.title: Privacy Policy
Policies.welcome: Welcome to our website. By accessing and using this site, you agree to comply with the following terms of use and all applicable laws.
Policies.operatorDetails: This site is managed by MTGBOX. For any inquiries, please contact us via email at support@mtgbox.fr.
Policies.siteFunctionality: The site allows users to access a product exchange platform. We act only as an intermediary; the exchanges concluded through the site are effective between the users.
Policies.cookiePolicy: Our site uses cookies to enhance your user experience.
Policies.accountDetails: To use certain features of the site, you must create an account by providing accurate and up-to-date information. Managing your account and password is your responsibility. The operator reserves the right to refuse registration or to close an account at its discretion.
Policies.intellectualPropertyDetails: The content published on this site, including texts, graphics, logos, and specific elements related to Magic: The Gathering, are protected by copyright and belong to the operator or are used with permission. All rights related to Magic: The Gathering are owned by their respective holders and are used here under license or with explicit permission.
Policies.liabilityDetails: The operator does not guarantee the accuracy, outcome, or reliability of the use of the materials on its website and declines any responsibility for errors or omissions in these materials.
Policies.conditionChangeDetails: The operator reserves the right to change these conditions at any time. Your continued use of the site following such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new conditions.
Policies.lawDetails: These conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of France, and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of this country or location.
